name: bang.html
description: BANG! Web Component custom elements with async templating, smooth syntax and custom void  tags!

scripts.test: npm run clean && watch -n 3 ./scripts/cpfiles.sh & serve -p 8080 docs/
scripts.prod: export BANG_PROD=test || set BANG_PROD=test&&npm run clean && watch -n 3 ./scripts/cpfiles.sh & serve -p 8080 docs/
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/ && rm -rf docs/vv && rm docs/*.js || :
scripts.prepublishOnly: export BANG_PROD=test || set BANG_PROD=test&&echo 'npm run pack' is not ready for mobile && rm -rf dist/ && ./scripts/cpfiles.sh
scripts.pack: rm -rf dist/ && mkdir dist/ && cp src/style.css dist/style.css && npx roadroller -t text -a eval src/bang.js -o dist/bang.js && cp dist/bang.js docs/bang-dev.js

author: @dosy
